About Us
O’Brien’s Irish Pub & Grill is the brainchild of three Irish friends who met in New York and wanted to create a neighborhood Irish bar for the people of Brandon – a meeting place where family and friends could get together and enjoy excellent food and beverages in the Irish spirit, warm hospitality and fun entertainment.
O’Brien’s has also become quite a sports bar over the years, with over 40 large screen TV’s to enjoy your favorite sports event with a cold brew and some tasty wings! We’re also the place to enjoy the party. We regularly feature events and live music.
If you are looking for great food, service & entertainment – all with an Irish spirit…then join us at O’Brien’s! We look forward to becoming your regular spot to hangout and meet old friends – and you are likely to make new ones too!
Best Irish Bar & Restaurant in Brandon Florida
Order starters and entrees of favorite Irish classics like shepard’s pie and fish and chips. Wash it all down with a craft beer from our selection of over 60 taps and bottles.
Order Online
“Click to Enlarge Menu”
Live Music & Entertainment
If you’re looking for a great night out, a fun afternoon with friends, or a casual authentic Irish dining and drinking experience — make plans to visit O’Brien’s Irish Pub & Grill. From traditional Irish food and craft beer to live music, sports viewing, and special events, we have it all!
We regularly host parties and theme nights as well as karaoke and trivia nights. We also have the perfect set-up for sports viewing making us one of the best places to watch sports in Brandon. Get your crew together and meet up at O’Brien’s for a fun day or night out.
And don’t forget to join us every year for the biggest St. Patrick’s Day party in Brandon!  Click below to see our upcoming events!
Check Out Our Events
Host Your Private Event at O’Brien’s Irish Pub & Grill
Looking for a place to host a group party or event in Brandon? We have the perfect venue for your group gathering! Bring in your friends and family and host a party at O’Brien’s.
Our private rooms are great for any type of group celebration. Bring in your crew for a fun and relaxed birthday party, retirement party, work happy hour, college graduation party, corporate event, rehearsal dinner, reunion party, wedding after-party, holiday party, funeral lunch, or anniversary celebration.
Contact Us
Get In Touch With Us Today
If you have questions or comments, please get a hold of us in whichever way is most convenient. You can use the contact form provided, call us or even mail us at the address below. We are always looking for ways to improve and are happy to answer any questions you may have.
701 W Lumsden Rd Brandon, FL 33511
11AM - 12AM Monday - Wednesday
11AM - 2AM Thursday - Sunday
813-661-9688
